source.0f3211c1:
Content


The dataset contains information on weather conditions recorded on each day at various weather stations around the world. Information includes precipitation, snowfall, temperatures, wind speed and whether the day included thunder storms or other poor weather conditions.
source.c4c246af: The Year 1942 had the lowest average maximum temperature , **25.8**
source.372abab2: The Temperature within the range **22.5-27.4** had the highest count between the years 1940 - 1945
source.b7ab03f9: **June - August** had the highest average MaxTemp
source.09703d2b: The Year 1945 had the lowest average minimum temperature , **17.6**
